attributes.action: Improve our lives and release un-productive hours to growing the economy by taking measures to address peak hour congestion on M25 (J22 to 16)
attributes.additional_details: We urge the Government to improve our lives and release un-productive hours to growing the economy by taking effective measures to address peak hour congestion on the M25 between junctions 22 and 16. The multi-billion pound project to widen this stretch of the M25 due for completion in Summer 2012 has failed to make journey times any shorter or less stressful.
